author: Cathy Pulsifer
message: You are special, you are unique, you are the best!
title: Thought of the day

author: William Arthur Ward
message: Four steps to achievement: Plan purposefully. Prepare prayerfully. Proceed positively. Pursue persistently.
title: Thought of the day

author: Bruce Lee
message: To know oneself is to study oneself in action with another person.
title: Thought of the day

author: Bishop Desmond Tutu
message: We must not allow ourselves to become like the system we oppose.
title: Thought of the day
